Title: Emily the Criminal
Plot: Desperate for income, Emily takes a shady gig buying goods with stolen credit cards supplied by a charismatic middleman named Youcef. Seduced by the quick cash and illicit thrills, they hatch a plan to take their business to the next level.
Tagline: High risks come with even higher rewards.
Stars: Aubrey Plaza, Theo Rossi, Megalyn Echikunwoke
